老師很cute，課程內容令人印象深刻。
會提供學生非常多的思考面向且授課內容有趣
I appreciate that the way Professor Corrigan interpret the texts we have read in the semester. I really enjoy the class very much.
Professor is very humorous, which chills the atmosphere and makes students involved more in the course. Also, professor teaches clearly that have me learn the poems and novels in depth.
It is a really nice course! I learn many things in this class and also cultivate my ability to appreciate literature! Thank you professor!
老師很溫柔又幽默 上課也認真
Corrigang是個很特別的老師，很有耐性、很紳士、也對學生很好，喜歡分享一些比較玄的事物，但上他的課會被他對文學和哲學的熱愛感動，很喜歡聽他解讀文學作品。
